about_the_game:
Will You Become My Purrsonal Butler?

In Meow Mission, solve various puzzles to rescue cats trapped in outer dimensions! These unique cats will be brought back to Tomcat House, where they can create special memories with Tomcat.

Are you ready to start to rescue these adorable cats?

A Variety of Puzzles

  • Solve Sokoban-based puzzles and embark on an adventure to find the lost cats!

  • Explore multi-dimensional spaces with familiar Sokoban puzzles, uniquely adapted with creative rules, offering a fresh challenge with each level.

  • Each puzzle will spark your problem-solving skills and keep you engaged.

Housing

  • Rescued cats will stay safe in Tomcat House, where they’ll enjoy special moments with Tomcat.

  • Interact and play with the cats in Tomcat House, though approach gently—some of them might have a bit of a temper!

  • Customize Tomcat House with artifacts discovered in different dimensions, and discover even more sides of Tomcat’s personality.

Collect Unique Cats

  • Gather cats with all kinds of personalities!

  • Spend time with the cats you rescue and build bonds to unlock special interactions and events.

Stories Beyond Dimensions

  • As you grow closer to each cat, hidden stories will be revealed, allowing you to experience their unique narratives through cut comics.

  • Dive into each cat’s story and uncover the charming depth of their personalities.

Are you ready to start to rescue these adorable cats?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur (11)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Meow Mission Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 32-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Play Meow Mission and solve a variety of puzzles to rescue cats trapped in an outer dimension! The rescued cats will be brought to the Tomcat House, where you can make memories with their unique personalities. Let's go rescue these adorable kitties!
supported_languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
